Detailed Description

This file declares useful functions and types for the VISHNU local account commands command.

Author:
Ibrahima Cisse (ibrahima.cisse@sysfera.com)

Function Documentation

boost::shared_ptr<Options> makeLocalAccountOptions ( std::string  pgName,
StringcallBackType &  fUserId,
std::string &  dietConfig,
StringcallBackType &  fMachineId,
StringcallBackType &  fAcLogin,
StringcallBackType &  fSshKeyPath,
StringcallBackType &  fHomeDirectory,
int  type = 0 
)

To build options for the VISHNU local account commands.

Parameters:
pgName : The name of the command
fUserId,: The user identifier option callback
dietConfig,: Represents the VISHNU config file
fMachineId,: The machine identifier option callback
fAcLogin,: The user login option callback
fSshKeyPath,: The user ssh key path option callback
fHomeDirectory,: The user home directory option callback
type,: Indicates if it is an add or an update command, 0 means update, and 1 means add
Returns:
The description of all options allowed by the command
